document.id: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2012-2
document.heading: Amending Chapter 1.01, “Code Adoption,” Chapter 1.04, “General Penalty,” and Chapter 1.10, “Administrative Citations,” and Other Provisions of the San Mateo Municipal Code Relating to Code Enforcement, and Adding Chapter 1.14, “Administrative Compliance Orders,” to the San Mateo Municipal Code

citations.citation: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2012-2
